mapper.insert: insert into meeting (meetingname, roomid, reservationistid, numberofparticipants, signinstarttime, signinendtime, starttime, endtime, reservationtime, canceledtime, description, status) values (#{meetingname}, #{roomid}, #{reservationistid}, #{numberofparticipants}, #{signinstarttime}, #{signinendtime}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{reservationtime}, #{canceledtime}, #{description}, #{status});
mapper.update: update meeting set canceledreason = #{canceledreason}, status = 1, canceledtime = now() where meetingid = #{meetingid}
mapper.delete: delete meeting,meetingparticipants from meeting left join meetingparticipants on meeting.meetingid = meetingparticipants.meetingid where meeting.meetingid = #{meetingid}
mapper.select:
select m.meetingid,m.meetingname,m.numberofparticipants,m.signinstarttime,m.signinendtime,m.starttime,m.endtime,m.reservationtime,m.roomid,m.reservationistid,m.description, e.employeename as reservationistname, mr.roomname as roomname from meeting as m, employee as e, meetingroom as mr where m.reservationistid = e.employeeid and m.roomid = mr.roomid and e.employeeid = #{employeeid} and m.status = 0
and m.meetingname like concat('%',#{meetingname},'%')

select m.*,e.employeename as reservationistname,mr.roomname as roomname from meeting as m,meetingroom as mr,employee as e where m.reservationistid = e.employeeid and m.roomid = mr.roomid and e.employeeid = #{employeeid} and m.status = 1
and m.meetingname like concat('%',#{meetingname},'%')

SELECT m.meetingid,m.meetingname,m.starttime,m.endtime,mr.roomname,e.employeeid,e.employeename as reservationistname,m.description,mp.status,m.signinstarttime,m.signinendtime FROM meetingparticipants as mp, meeting as m,employee as e,meetingroom as mr WHERE mp.meetingid = m.meetingid and m.reservationistid = e.employeeid and m.roomid = mr.roomid and mp.employeeid = #{employeeid} and m.status = 0
and m.meetingname like concat('%',#{meetingname},'%')

SELECT m.meetingid,m.meetingname,mr.roomname,m.starttime,m.endtime FROM meeting as m,meetingroom as mr WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 WEEK) <= date(m.starttime) and m.roomid = mr.roomid and m.reservationistid = #{employeeid} and m.status = 0
and m.meetingname like concat('%',#{meetingname},'%')
SELECT m.meetingname, m.numberofparticipants, m.reservationtime, m.description, mr.roomname, mr.roomnum FROM meeting as m, meetingroom as mr where m.meetingid = #{meetingid} AND m.roomid = mr.roomid

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(m.starttime, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM meetingparticipants as mp, meeting as m, employee as e, meetingroom as mr WHERE mp.meetingid = m.meetingid and m.reservationistid = e.employeeid and m.roomid = mr.roomid and mp.employeeid = #{employeeid} and m.status = 0
